title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and server for running large language models locally (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration package letting any chain/agent use Ollama models via a standard interface.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compat endpoints).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama published to Maven Central; offers sync/async APIs and streaming chat.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based CLI that wraps Ollama with extra helpers like chat history, prompt templates & shell completions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as a GitHub-Copilot-like assistant.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that connects to Ollama via the official JS client; useful starter template.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing how to build a RAG pipeline with Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models through slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama server & web-ui onto Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-model-list
summary: Curated list of community-created Modelfiles (CodeLlama, SQLCoder, Zephyr, etc.) ready for Ollama.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js REST starter that exposes additional endpoints (batch chat, file Q&A) over Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset-ai, allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.
